Horch Roofing
=============

**##### Categories

Construction & Design Construction & Design

*   [2414 Camden Rd.Warren ME 04864](https://www.google.com/maps?q=2414%20Camden%20Rd.,%20Warren,%20ME,%2004864)
*   [(207) 273-1111](tel:2072731111)
*   [Send Email](javascript:void(0))
*   [Visit Website](http://www.horchroofing.com/)
*   [](https://www.facebook.com/HorchRoofing "View on Facebook")[](http://instagram.com/horchroofing "View on Instagram")

### About Us

Horch Roofing's professional contractors are committed to safety and excellence, providing Mid-Coast Maine towns from Belfast to Brunswick with quality roofing services since 2003.

From the very beginning of the process until the very end, Horch Roofing provides the best service. We offer estimates free of charge, and we try to be prompt returning your call, measuring your roof, and mailing you the estimate. Our knowledgeable, experienced staff is always available to answer your questions and process your concerns at any point in your roofing project. We are one of the fastest roofing specialists in the area; we will have the project completed in 3-5 days. Because we have a large staff, if requested, we can finish your project in 1 day. With us, there is no mess and hassle for weeks on end. Your entire property is protected when we work on your roof. We keep your home watertight and safe from the moment we begin your roofing project. And we pride ourselves in taking care of your siding, windows, flowers, and deck while we work. We use a synthetic underlayment to serve as a second weather barrier. This material has better resistance to moisture, so your roof is always protected.

Maine Coast Roofing
===================

**![Image 13: Maine Coast Roofing](https://chambermaster.blob.core.windows.net/images/customers/3098/members/725/logos/MEMBER_PAGE_HEADER/mid_coast_maine_roofing_near_me_install_repair_belfast_bar_harbor_augusta_maine.jpg)

![Image 14: Maine Coast Roofing](https://chambermaster.blob.core.windows.net/images/customers/3098/members/725/logos/MEMBER_LOGO/maine_coast_roofing_company_near_me_install_repair_belfast_bar_harbor_augusta_me_.PNG)

##### Categories

Construction & Design

*   [33 Front St.Suite 1A Belfast ME 04915](https://www.google.com/maps?q=33%20Front%20St.,%20Suite%201A,%20Belfast,%20ME,%2004915)
*   [(207) 200-1053](tel:2072001053)
*   [Send Email](javascript:void(0))
*   [Visit Website](http://mainecoastroofing.com/)
*   [](https://www.facebook.com/mainecoastroofing "View on Facebook")[](http://instagram.com/mainecoastroofing "View on Instagram")

**Hours:**

Monday through Thursday 9am-5pm, Friday 9am - 1pm, Closed Saturday and Sunday

**Driving Directions:**

Local office located in downtown Belfast Maine

### About Us

Maine Coast Roofing specializes in residential home roofing, commercial and industrial roofing, and town and public facilities' roofing. We offer new roof installation and replacement, major and minor repairs, 15 point roof inspections, coatings and waterproofing, maintenance programs, and service contracts. We install and replace asphalt shingle, standing seam metal, cedar shake, composite synthetic shake, TPO, and EPDM roofing. 

Our team is dedicated to providing the highest standards of quality and customer satisfaction in Mid Coast Maine. We offer fast and efficient repairs to address leaks, storm damage, or general wear, keeping your roof secure. We also offer complete roof replacement services designed to upgrade and enhance your home or building's durability and value. At Maine Coast Roofing, we offer proactive maintenance solutions to identify and resolve minor issues, extending the life of your roof and saving on costly repairs. Our experienced team in Belfast near you delivers high-quality materials and professional craftsmanship, providing durable, energy-efficient solutions that stand up to the demands of Maine weather. We use products like Tamko, Everlast, Drexel, & Brava. Call us today!

Towns: Auburn, Augusta, Bangor, Bar Harbor, Belfast, Blue Hill, Boothbay, Bristol, Bucksport, Camden, Castine, Damariscotta, Deer Isle, Ellsworth, Islesboro, New Harbor, Pemaquid, Rockland, Rockport, Sedwick, Southport, Stonington, Vinal Haven, Waldoboro, Wiscasset

Counties: Androscoggin, Cumberland, Hancock, Kennebec, Knox, Lincoln, Penobscot, Sagadahoc and Waldo Counties

data.title: Local Roofing Company & Contractors Serving South Portland, Portland and Beyond
data.description: Leader among Maine roofing companies & contractors in coastal Maine. Top-rated roofers since 2003. Our values: Safety, Quality, Respect. Call us!
data.content:
Welcome to Horch Roofing
------------------------

**Maine’s Trusted Roofing & Exterior Experts!**

Since 2003, Horch Roofing has proudly served the communities of coastal Maine with expert roofing and gutter replacement, repair, and installation. From Portland to Warren—and now **Ellsworth**, with our newest office—we’re here to deliver safety, quality, reliability, and care to even more homes and businesses.

We’re also excited to introduce our new**Exterior Services Division**, offering additional ways to protect and improve your property with the same trusted team you know.

Our services include standing seam metal, asphalt shingle, and EPDM rubber roofing, seamless gutter systems, small projects, repairs and free, detailed estimates for both residential and commercial projects.

Sustainability is at the heart of our work. Through our **Reroof and Recycle** program, we recycle 100% of roofing debris, along with everyday materials like paper, bottles, and cans—because taking care of people means taking care of the planet, too.

Products & Services
-------------------

Is Your Roof Ready for Storms?
------------------------------

Reach out to Horch Roofing—your trusted local roofing company proudly serving Warren, Portland, South Portland, Ellsworth, and surrounding areas from our three convenient locations across Maine.

Inclement weather is sure to come sooner or later. That’s why you should get in touch with Horch Roofing to make sure your roof is prepared. Our local roofing company serves clients throughout Warren, Portland &South Portland, ME. You can count on us to revamp your roof from top to bottom.

Call [207-273-1111](tel:+2072731111) today to schedule services with Horch Roofing, your trusted local roofing company.

What sets Horch apart
---------------------

![Image 1](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Community bonds

At Horch Roofing we are very passionate about taking care of our community, our neighbors and have given back in so many ways.

![Image 2](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Core values

Taking care of our customers, employees, communities and the environment. With our main main goal - We take care of people.

![Image 3](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Locally-owned & operated

We also pride ourselves in being Local, which not many of our competitors can say.

![Image 4](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Dedicated to recycling

We are proud to recycle almost all of our debris and roofing waste.

![Image 5](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Always giving back

We have given 23 Roofs to Habitat for Humanity. Almost 2 a year since 2012. We've donated roofs to the Bangor and Portland Ronald Mc Donald Houses.

![Image 6](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Long-standing history

We have been around for 22 years this year, which means that we will take care of any issues customers have and they know where to find us.

![Image 7](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Serious about success

We now have three locations across Maine. committed to further expanding our business.

![Image 8](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

###### Trained and experienced

Our employees undergo OSHA training and we are a proud member of the NRCA.

![Image 9](blob:http://localhost/57e69d3e025e79bb006049c115722cdb)

### 3 reasons to choose Horch Roofing

Since 2003, we’ve had a reputation for providing world-class roofing services. You’ll appreciate that:

*   We offer free estimates
*   We recycle 100% of roofing waste
*   We never cut corners

Not only do we recycle roofing debris, but we also recycle all water bottles, soda cans and paper we use. Contact us now to learn more about our roofing services in Warren, Portland & South Portland, ME.

##### Welcome to Horch Roofing

![Image 10](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aLp-_CWrTio/hqdefault.jpg)

##### Meet the Team

![Image 11](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6Z7snX5orsI/hqdefault.jpg)

##### Testimonials

![Image 12](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/d7Lngyv7cGU/hqdefault.jpg)

what our customers have to say
------------------------------

![Image 13](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

We are delighted with our standing seam metal roof by Horch Roofing. The crew completed a complex job neatly and efficiently. They did a great job of cleaning up the site. The crew had a great work ethic (staying on the job into the evening when the weather was good). Other companies offered to do the job at a lower cost, but we did not have confidence that they would do such a good job. We made the right choice!

![Image 14](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

I rent had the good fortune of having Horch Roofing complete a new roof shingling job at my residence. From the project estimator (Bill) to the Project Manager (Jeremy) to the office coordinator (Chelsea) to the actual installation crew, my expectations were exceeded! Clear communication throughout from all members of the Horch team was spot on! I easily will recommend Horch Roofing to anyone considering hiring a roofing contractor.

![Image 15](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

Four members of the Horch Roofing team interacted with me over several days. Each of them was courteous and knowledgeable as we worked through the available options. After selecting repair vs replacement, they provided a description, with photos, of the repairs, and a very realistic assessment of the uncertainties that remained. They helped me in making an informed decision and I will happily have them back a second time if replacement is required.

![Image 16](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

Horch roofing did a great job communicating the time frame for our metal roof installation and we were pleased with the quality of the work. Additionally, there was no cleanup afterwards. Siding that was damaged was replaced and repainted and all the litter was removed.

![Image 17](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

Very pleased with the outcome of the roof of my garage! Great hard working crew and no mess left behind. A new skylight was installed as well, very pleased. I’m a repeat customer, my house roof was installed by Horch Roofing two summers ago.

![Image 18](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

Horch Roofing did a new roof on my house a couple of weeks ago and I couldn't be happier. The roof looks great. I love the look of the black architectural shingles and the metal valley gutters. The crew was great. Done in a day and they left everything perfectly clean.

Tim

![Image 19](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

Working with Horch was great. They provided a clear quote, got me on the schedule quickly and cleaned up thoroughly.

![Image 20](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

The Horch folks were meticulous. After the bulk of the project was completed, they paid special attention to the cosmetic details so that everything looked perfect!

![Image 21](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

Horch Roofing is a very professional, organized entity. It was a very simple process from quoting to planning/scheduling and on to completion. I highly recommend and will use the Horch team for our next roofing project.

![Image 22](blob:http://localhost/dabe910a2ebcf2d72f5731f34cf349d1)

Horch Roofing installed a metal roof on my house in May. They are a great group to work with. Alex did the estimate and answered all my questions and kept in touched with me while I was waiting for the other companies estimates. His estimate was very detailed compared to the other companies. Tori got my work schedule fast and the team that showed up to my house at 7am and left at 2pm. They put down tarps, striped the old asphalt shingles off, and cleaned up the old shingles and nails. The lawn looked like it did before they show up. My new roof looks great and has been through a couple of rain storms and it has no leaks. I am very satisfied with the company..

![Image 23](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

![Image 24: best of the best of knox county award badge](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

![Image 25: national roofing contractors association member badge](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

![Image 26](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

data.title: 5 Signs that You’re Dealing with an Unprofessional Roofer
data.description: If you're in the market for roofing work, it's important to be able to spot a scammer. Learn the 5 signs that you're dealing with an unprofessional roofer.
data.content:
![Image 1: 5 Signs that You're Dealing with an Unprofessional Roofer](https://jkroofing.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/5-Signs-that-Youre-Dealing-with-an-Unprofessional-Roofer-1024x679.jpg)

Your roof is your home’s first line of defense against inclement weather like [strong hail events](https://jkroofing.com/blog/colorado-storm-season-the-science-of-hail-and-how-to-prepare/) and [wind storms](https://jkroofing.com/blog/colorado-storm-season-the-science-of-wind-and-how-to-prepare-your-roof/). Because of this vital function it serves, you must make sure that your roof is in great condition year-round.

When you realize your roof needs some attention—be it a full roof replacement or repairing some damage—you can’t afford to go with a sub-par roofing company. Not all roofing companies are built the same, and unfortunately, there are a lot of roofing scams out there.

If you’re in the market for roofing work to be done on your house, you need to know how some roofers rip you off so you can steer clear of the bad companies and only work with the best.

Here are five signs that you’re dealing with an unprofessional roofer.

1. They are unresponsive or slow to respond and don’t have a professional presence.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A characteristic trait of an [unprofessional roofing contractor](https://jkroofing.com/blog/5-common-roofing-scams-and-steps-to-avoid-them/) is being slow to respond—or not responding at all. Roofing projects can be complex, and as a result, homeowners can have a lot of questions about the work being done on their property. If your roofer is slow to get back to you when you reach out (or they don’t respond at all), they’re not demonstrating a very high level of professionalism.

If a roofer doesn’t have a website or any reviews or testimonials online, that’s a major red flag. Every contractor should have an online presence at this point, and be able to show customer reviews or provide references. A good roofing contractor will be delighted to show you their portfolio and prove their expertise to you. They should also be licensed and insured, so you are not liable for damages or incorrect work. Ask to see their licenses and insurance information.

2. They don’t treat your property with respect.
-----------------------------------------------

It should go without saying that a guest on your property is expected to act respectfully toward you and your home. An unprofessional roofer might do the opposite by tossing your patio furniture around, leaving trash all over the place, driving onto your grass, etc. You shouldn’t have to deal with this kind of behavior or disrespect from a roofer!

One of the main jobs of a roofing contractor is protecting your property anytime they’re on your roof. To protect your property they’ll cover your attic, windows, landscaping, move anything on your patio, and stay on only paved surfaces. They will also clean up after the job and use a magnet to sweep for any nails that are on the ground.

3. Their work appears sloppy or uneven and critical materials were left off.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don’t settle for sloppy work. Roofs should have straight lines that look uniform throughout. If you notice that your roofing contractor’s work appears uneven or just looks bad (including things like mismatched shingles, missing shingles or crooked lines), they may not properly understand [your roofing system](https://jkroofing.com/blog/what-goes-into-a-roof-the-roofing-system-explained/). A professional roofer will take the time to inspect your current roof and create an effective strategy for completing any repairs that need to be addressed.

There are certain materials that need to be present with roofing. These include decking, flashing, underlayment, drip edges, ice and water shield, vents, ridge capping, boots and shingles or another roofing material. Cutting corners with materials are ways inexperienced contractors think they can save money. They may take advantage of your lack of knowledge.

Your roofing contractor should be a reliable, reputable contractor. You need to be 100% confident in your selection. Key items that show a lack of experience include an incorrect use of roofing nails and nail patterns, improper or missing started shingles, improper installation of underlayment, neglecting to look in your attic and review your ventilation, not planning for ice dams, ignoring product manufacturer’s guidelines and voiding your warranty, and not properly obtaining roof permits.

4. They reuse old materials.
----------------------------

This is a classic sign of an unprofessional roofer. When they are repairing or replacing your old roof, they shouldn’t reuse existing materials that may be inferior in quality, damaged, or just old. This applies to things like your flashing, drip edges, underlayment, etc. In some cases, a contractor might offer you a price break to use “leftover” or discounted materials. These “special deals” rarely lead to a durable roof. For example, new drip edge flashing is needed anytime you are shingling your roof. It prevents many problems like leaks, decking decay, and keeps insects out of the attic.

You must have confidence that your roofer has [the right materials](https://jkroofing.com/blog/roofing-materials-guide-which-is-right-for-you/)—and the right knowledge—to get your job done professionally and to your satisfaction.

5. Their business practices seem sketchy.
-----------------------------------------

There are a number of roofing scams out there that you must be on the lookout for. Make sure your roofing contractor isn’t a storm chaser from [out of state](https://jkroofing.com/blog/why-should-i-choose-a-local-roofer/), they’re locally licensed and bonded, and they’re registered as a business in Colorado. Don’t fall for their pushy sales strategies or bold-face lies that they were sent by your insurance company without your prior knowledge. These are [signs of a roofing scam](https://jkroofing.com/blog/5-clues-that-a-storm-chaser-is-at-your-door/)!

A couple of other things to watch out for are roofers requiring full payment up front, no written contract is provided, high-pressure today-only sales tactics, mystery damage on your roof, and unexpectedly lower quotes.

Go With the Best Colorado Roofing Company
-----------------------------------------

A professional roofer in Colorado is one who is knowledgeable, experienced, certified, and professional. Take time to find the best Colorado roofing company near you. You want a company that is going to be around and will stand behind the work they do.

J&K Roofing has completed over 50,000+ roofing and exterior projects throughout Colorado—specifically the Denver Metro, Front Range, Colorado Springs, and Fort Collins areas—for almost 40 years. We’re certified and experienced in all roofing materials, and we will get your job done the right way.

Get in touch with us by calling[303-425-7531](tel:3034257531) or [completing this online form](https://jkroofing.com/contact). We can’t wait to hear from you and talk about your roofing needs!
